title: Highest Percentage of Female Primary Education Teachers
description: In 2023, 99.5% of primary education teachers in Belarus were female, the highest percentage in the world.

title: Lowest Maternal Mortality Ratio
description: Belarus had the lowest maternal mortality ratio in the world in 2023, with only 1 death per 100,000 live births.

title: Lowest Percentage of Women Married by Age 15
description: In 2019, only 0.1% of women aged 20-24 in Belarus were married by age 15, the lowest percentage globally.

title: Lowest Net Bilateral Aid Flows from EU Institutions
description: In 2022, Belarus had the lowest net bilateral aid flows from EU institutions, amounting to -$102.24 million.
